text: Contraindications to liver transplant Relative - Advanced age « local age limit 60 - 65 years + requires the need fo assess physiological age rather than chronological age and to assess the patient's functional status - Obesity (BMI =40) « Portal vein thrombosis — needs detailed assessment of vasculature « Previous non-hepatic malignancies - 5 years of remission * High viral load HIV/HIV not on Haart
